channel.title: Virus URL redirect thing cure and detection.
channel.description:
[url]https://www.dcwg.org/[/url]
Visit [b]>[/b] Detect [b]>[/b] one of the sites in your language
Yes, I am being a touch too lazy with this. :|
Pretty much the FBI found out that some virtual thieves they arrested made a virus that redirects sites through to a fake one only with the same URL as the real one. Tens of thousands, if not hundreds of thousands of computers around the world are infected with this virus.
There is a certian cut-off date where they will stop supporting the people who are infected and the people who are infected will be unable to connect to the internet.

item.title: Virus URL redirect thing cure and detection.
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Jethrosoup:

I wonder how many people I know are going to lose internet tomorrow.

Hope it affects all those “lol black mesa will nevar be relesed lol” idiots.

Read full topic
item.source: Virus URL redirect thing cure and detection.

item.title: Virus URL redirect thing cure and detection.
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
OrderOfDagon:

Yeah, I don’t really go to too many sites, myself. I mean recently, I have gone to a couple more than usual -following news links from trusted ‘subscribable’ members of Facebook- but hopefully I’m not that unlucky.

My PC is custom built and is running some rather new hardware, so I hope I dodge this crazy virus. The internet is one of the only reasons I use a computer – it would suck to lose it for a while. Obviously getting a new cheap computer to surf the web with would be my next mode-of-action, but all-the-same, it would be a pain in the ass.

Just keep a windows setup disc close, or a bootable flash drive, all of my discs get scratched so I moved to usb sticks and SD cards ages ago.

Read full topic
